name: Holy Chicken!
description:
Created for the Global Game Jam 2020.

Holy Chicken! is a short high-action party game featuring 1v1 arena game play, playable with keyboard and controller. Two heroic chickens are fighting to be the first to summon the holy egg. Each player collects bricks that are being dropped from the sky and repairing the shrine in the middle with them. Get cheered on by a horde of enthusiastic chickens and gain victory!

Holy Chicken! won first place at our local jam site!

Jam Site:

Breda University of Applied Sciences

Diversifiers:
  • Language-Independence (Sponsored by Valve Software)
  • Preaching to the Choir
  • !Coding
Platforms:

MS Windows

Tools and Technologies:

Unreal Engine
